Title: Fly Away
Writer: Darlene Hunt (creator), Darlene Hunt, Dennis Kinski (staff writer)
Actors: Laura Linney, Oliver Platt, Gabriel Basso, John Benjamin Hickey
Plot: After getting lost during a scuba diving lesson, Cathy (Laura Linney) lands in the boat of a local fisherman. And unaware of the frantic search for his missing wife, Paul (Oliver Platt) ...
